TopicTitle: Trying to add a spinning cenfugal module to my space station.

Articles.Content:
So what mods and methods do I need to go about this?

Thanks
well habitat pack from porkjet had some spinning hapitat parts. not sure if its exacly what you need

Also try Infernal Robotics WIP Station Parts. That adds a rotating hub you can attach anything to. There's a small MM patch linked to at the bottom of the first page, though I haven't had a chace to test those parts since IR 0.17. Let me know if it's not working.
